channel.title: Errr this annoying webclient error
channel.description:
it works fine for me, But for some others, it loads and unpacks the cache fine, but when they try to login, it says "Error connecting to server."
Port checker tells me that my ports are open. :c
I have changed the IP in my gui.java and client.java
So any help? :\
[B][Edit] This is NOT advertisement but see if it works for you :/
http://brokenrealm.webs.com/play-2[/B]

it works fine for me,
